message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going for 50/50
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a bit more. Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you less, but I'm not going to give up control
I'm willing to make a concession, but I need a bit more. Let's try to find a middle ground.
I'm not budging, you're getting a smaller and smaller share
I'm getting desperate, but I'm willing to give you a bit more. Let's try to make a deal.
You're running out of time, I'm taking what's left
I'm making one last attempt to make a deal. Please consider this offer.
I'm taking control, you're getting a tiny share
I'm willing to accept the risk of getting nothing. I'm not willing to accept such a small share.
